Package accounts.bank.managing.thesis.bachelor.rastvdmy.service

Class CardServiceTest

java.lang.Object
accounts.bank.managing.thesis.bachelor.rastvdmy.service.CardServiceTest
@ExtendWith(org.mockito.junit.jupiter.MockitoExtension.class) public class CardServiceTest extends Object
This class is used to test the functionality of the CardService class. It uses the Mockito framework for mocking dependencies and JUnit for running the tests.

    • setUp

      @BeforeEach public void setUp()
      This method is used to set up the initial state for the tests.

    • testGetAllCards

      @Test public void testGetAllCards()
      This method tests the functionality of the getAllCards method in the CardService class. It verifies that the method returns all cards in the repository.

    • testFilterAndSortCards

      @Test public void testFilterAndSortCards()
      This method tests the functionality of the filterAndSortCards method in the CardService class. It verifies that the method returns a page of cards sorted and filtered according to the provided Pageable object.

    • testGetCardById_ValidCard

      @Test public void testGetCardById_ValidCard()
      This method tests the functionality of the getCardById method in the CardService class. It verifies that the method returns the correct card when a valid ID is provided.

    • testGetCardById_InvalidCard

      @Test public void testGetCardById_InvalidCard()
      This method tests the functionality of the getCardById method in the CardService class. It verifies that the method throws an exception when an invalid ID is provided.

      @Test public void testGetCardByCardNumber_ValidCard()
      This method tests the functionality of the getCardByCardNumber method in the CardService class. It verifies that the method returns the correct card when a valid card number is provided.

      This method tests the functionality of the getCardByCardNumber method in the CardService class. It verifies that the method throws an exception when an invalid card number is provided.

      @Test public void testCreateCard_ValidUserAndCurrency()
      This method tests the functionality of the createCard method in the CardService class. It verifies that the method creates a card for a valid user and currency.

      This method tests the functionality of the createCard method in the CardService class. It verifies that the method throws an exception when the user is blocked.
